pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 30, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, August 30, 2016:

Beijing, People’s Republic of China

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Beijing, People’s Republic of China.

VIP Terminal
Beijing Capital International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


15:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable hosted by the China Entrepreneur Club.

Statesman Hall, Club Wing, 2nd Floor
St. Regis Beijing Hotel

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
